author: srimanob
body:
@ssekmen : Not sure that it's your intension to throw the event if particle is unknown in 9_4_x, while you kind-of by-pass it in 10_3_X. I tested and get the same result. Some high mass particle can't return to particle table. 

@fabiocos : This may help part of the issue in relval 9_4_X.
title: Skip unknown particle data
